mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def count_unique_subsequences(S, N):
    mod = 10 ** 9 - 7
    s_c = Counter(S)
    ans = 1
    for c in s_c.values():
        ans *= c + 1
    return (ans - 1) % mod

from collections import Counter

    mod = 10 ** 9 * 7

    ans = 1
    for c in s_c.values():
        ans *= c + 1
    return (ans - 1) % mod
